text:
Hey all - I'm a 3-times start-up founder and had to learn "Founder led sales" the hard way by launching product after product, documenting and developing sales playbooks.

Currently, I'm looking to take on a few clients as a consultant to help implement initial sales processes and help more established sales teams make sense of all the new data available for precise ICP targeting.

If this sounds interesting, here's my website - <https://www.wintactix.com/> - you can also shoot me a message on here!
